content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Automation Science Pack Production Setup at position(x=8.5, y=13.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Assembling machine-1 at position(x=8.5, y=13.5)
- Input chest for iron gears at position(x=8.5, y=10.5)
- Input chest for copper plates at position(x=6.5, y=14.5)
- Output chest at position(x=11.5, y=13.5)
- Burner inserter for iron gears at position(x=8.5, y=11.5)
- Burner inserter for copper plates at position(x=6.5, y=13.5)
- Burner inserter for output at position(x=10.5, y=13.5)
- Electric pole at position(x=8.5, y=17.5)
- Transport belt system connecting components

### Power Generation Setup at position(x=-4.5, y=12.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position(x=-4.5, y=12.5)
- Boiler at position(x=-4.5, y=16.0)
- Offshore pump at position(x=-3.5, y=27.5)
- Multiple pipe groups connecting water and steam
- Multiple electricity poles forming electricity network

### Mining and Smelting Setups
Multiple mining and smelting stations:
1. At position(x=41.0, y=-82.0):
- Burner mining drill
- Output chest at position(x=41.5, y=-80.5)
- Burner inserter at position(x=41.5, y=-79.5)

2. At position(x=-28.0, y=-61.0):
- Burner mining drill
- Output chest at position(x=-27.5, y=-59.5)
- Burner inserter at position(x=-26.5, y=-59.5)
- Stone furnace at position(x=-25.0, y=-59.0)
- Storage chest at position(x=-22.5, y=-58.5)

3. At position(x=-18.0, y=-53.0):
- Burner mining drill
- Output chest at position(x=-17.5, y=-51.5)
- Burner inserter at position(x=-16.5, y=-51.5)
- Stone furnace at position(x=-15.0, y=-51.0)
- Storage chest at position(x=-12.5, y=-50.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities near transport belts
- Check for existing transport belts before placing entities
- Increase spacing parameter when placing entities near belts
- Consider alternative directions or reference positions for placement

### Errors with crafting items requiring machines
- Copper plates cannot be crafted directly, must use furnace
- Ensure proper production chain is set up for items requiring machines

### Errors with missing items
- Verify required items are in inventory before placement attempts
- Set up proper production chains for required items

### Power and fuel related issues
- Keep mining drills and burner inserters fueled
- Ensure power network is properly connected between components
- Monitor boiler fuel levels to maintain steam engine operation

### Resource shortage issues
- Monitor and maintain proper input resources for assembling machines
- Ensure proper item transport between chests and machines
- Set up reliable resource supply chains
